'''Edith''' is a resident of [[Lakeside Estates]] and a friend of [[Mr. Paige]].

==History==
===Mr. Paige===
Edith was out in the courtyard of her retirement home when firefighters arrived. They asked her if it was Mr. Paige, which she confirmed. She also asked them to let her know when he was up for visitors so she could stop by for a pick-me-up. ''("[[Invisible to Me]]")''

===Repeated Falls===
Travis and Maya responded when Edith fell and dislocated her shoulder. Because of previous similar calls, Travis worried about Edith and wanted her to see a doctor. However, she said she was fine and didn't want to trouble her grandson with it. Travis later came back and told Edith she needed to see a doctor. Just then, her grandson came in and with Edith's permission, Travis told him that she needed to see a doctor. ''("[[Reignited]]")''

===Set-Up===
After hearing that Grant and Travis had seen each other at yoga and Travis hadn't called Grant, Edith pretended to have trouble breathing and called Travis and Grant to her to set them up. ''("[[Let It Burn]]")''

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is involved with [[Mr. Paige]]. When she saw the firefighters coming to free him, she asked them to let her know when he was up for visitors so she could go see him. ''("[[Invisible to Me]]")''

Her husband died of Parkinson's. ''("[[Reignited]]")''

==Notes and Trivia==
*She says pain meds just make her queasy. ''("[[Reignited]]")''
*She's 87. ''("[[Let It Burn]]")''
